summary: Completed testing of Holdings/Alerts stat card dropdown features and AI Coach tab cleanup. All features working correctly.
passed_tests: Frontend: Clicking Positions stat card opens dropdown with data-testid='positions-dropdown' showing holdings list
Frontend: Clicking Positions stat card again closes the dropdown
Frontend: Clicking Alerts stat card opens dropdown with data-testid='alerts-dropdown' showing active alerts (META, TSLA, NVDA)
Frontend: Clicking Alerts stat card again closes the dropdown
Frontend: AI Coach tab (tab-coach) does NOT have Holdings panel on the left (moved to header dropdown)
Frontend: AI Coach tab does NOT have separate Alerts & Quick Stats panel on the right
Frontend: AI Coach tab shows AI Command Center taking ~9 columns
Frontend: AI Coach tab shows MARKET INTEL section on the right (~3 columns)
Frontend: Trading tab shows Live Trade Alerts panel
Frontend: Trading tab shows Trading Bot panel with Autonomous/Confirmation/Paused modes
Frontend: Analytics tab shows Learning Loop with strategy cards (Rubber Band SCALP, Breakout INTRADAY, Squeeze SWING)
Frontend: Analytics tab shows AI Tuning Recommendations with 3 pending
Frontend: Analytics tab shows Scanner and Alerts & Intel sections
Frontend: Tab switching works correctly between all 3 tabs (Trading ↔ AI Coach ↔ Analytics)
Frontend: Active tab has visual highlighting (cyan border/background)
critical_code_review_comments: expandedStatCard state correctly toggles between 'positions', 'alerts', and null
Positions dropdown (data-testid='positions-dropdown') correctly shows holdings with symbol, quantity, and unrealized P&L
Alerts dropdown (data-testid='alerts-dropdown') correctly shows enhancedAlerts first, then falls back to basic alerts
AI Coach tab layout simplified to grid lg:grid-cols-12 with AI Command (9 cols) + Market Intel (3 cols)
No Holdings or Alerts panels in AI Coach tab - they're now in header stat card dropdowns
context_for_next_testing_agent: Header stat cards now have expandable dropdowns: Positions shows holdings, Alerts shows active alerts. AI Coach tab simplified to AI Command Center (9 cols) + Market Intel (3 cols). Trading tab has Live Trade Alerts + Trading Bot. Analytics tab has Learning Dashboard with strategy cards, recommendations, and tuning history. All data-testids working: positions-dropdown, alerts-dropdown, tab-trading, tab-coach, tab-analytics.

positions_stat_card_dropdown.content: Shows holdings with symbol, quantity, unrealized P&L
positions_stat_card_dropdown.toggle_behavior: Click to open, click again to close

alerts_stat_card_dropdown.content: Shows enhancedAlerts (META, TSLA, NVDA) with grade badges
alerts_stat_card_dropdown.toggle_behavior: Click to open, click again to close

ai_coach_tab_cleanup.layout: AI Command Center (9 cols) + Market Intel (3 cols)
